name: Box Game (Work In Progress)
description:
First beta I'm releasing for this untitled game. It started off as a fun bright shooter to test out the procedural room creation I had been working on and has become a sort of scary? Horror? Thriller-want-to-be thing? I'm not really sure. Anyway please test it out and give me some feedback if you have time. I'd really like to know about the performance and such. Thank you! 

WASD to move

Mouse to look around.

Left Click to shoot.

E to Lock onto enemy(Kind of buggy)

Q to send follower to that point

ESC to exit game
